channel.title: How do I make interfaces?
channel.description:
Well it's something I have been wanting to learn for a while. My friend Alex who is the main developer for Keldagrim has been showing me some he has been making and it's time I learn how to make them. From what I've seen on Google it just states I need to use a photo editor program to make the background for the image. But after I get pretty much lost.
Can somebody give me some tips on what I need to do?

item.title: How do I make interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

use lin’s interface emulator/editor

and yes, it does work:

http://ruune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/configuration/306719-10-updated-interfaces-through-cache-other-stuff.html
those are interfaces I created.

remove the 2nd u…

item.title: How do I make interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:439750”]^ Don’t listen to him. Hardcoding interfaces is bad, and if you’re going to make them that way, at least use my Interface Maker. I recommend my Interface Editor though, since it’s fully capable of editing everything the proper way. Shitty program, but it does the job.[/quote]I can’t open up a cache with it how do I it only allows me to open .ini files

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

^ Don’t listen to him. Hardcoding interfaces is bad, and if you’re going to make them that way, at least use my Interface Maker. I recommend my Interface Editor though, since it’s fully capable of editing everything the proper way. Shitty program, but it does the job.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @Compulsion Compulsion
item.description:
@Compulsion wrote:

Well in order to make a interface you need images. First you make the background. The buttons you have to make a separate image for each. When you’re coding, have the images in the sprites folder.

Here’s a video I recommend you to watch on this video how to learn to position interfaces, and code each button.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=21rJ3kahb1c[/youtube]

Use Kurdz Sprites while watching the tutorial. If you get stuck look at my coding, and interpret it. Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make interfaces?

item.description:

Well it’s something I have been wanting to learn for a while. My friend Alex who is the main developer for Keldagrim has been showing me some he has been making and it’s time I learn how to make them. From what I’ve seen on Google it just states I need to use a photo editor program to make the background for the image. But after I get pretty much lost.

Can somebody give me some tips on what I need to do?
